meanings.definition: Situated or growing at altitudes just below the alpine zone.
meanings.sent1: The subalpine flowers bloomed beautifully on the mountain slopes.
meanings.sent2: The hiker enjoyed the subalpine scenery during the trek.
meanings.sent3: The subalpine trees whispered secrets to each other in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The subalpine landscape was a patchwork quilt of colors.
meanings.sent5: The subalpine air was crisp and invigorating, filling the lungs with freshness.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the region just below the alpine zone.
meanings.sent1: The subalpine climate was cooler than the lower valleys.
meanings.sent2: Many animals thrive in the subalpine ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The subalpine villages nestled snugly among the hills.
meanings.sent4: The subalpine environment felt like a hidden paradise.
meanings.sent5: The subalpine meadows stretched endlessly, a sea of green under the sky.
